content:
I need help with wordsmithing the "missed message" / "digest" emails to make them read well in the various cases:
https://github.com/zulip/zulip/pull/3198#issuecomment-272684721
I think the "digest" emails should just be called digest emails in the subject.
I don't see why we shouldn't do that and it'll keep the two vastly different.
